items.sentence: I never see her without thinking of her mother.
You know where to find me if you need anything.
You should buy some cough medicine and aspirin.
I knew I wasn\'t the only one who thought that.
I knew Tom couldn\'t have done this by himself.
I knew we should\'ve brought more food with us.
I knew you wouldn\'t like the way Tom did that.
I know Tom didn\'t go home with Mary yesterday.
Tom said I was the only one who said thank you.
Tom asked Mary if she wanted to ride his horse.
Tom asked Mary to pass him the salt and pepper.
I don\'t like the neighborhood where Tom lives.
I don\'t often have the chance to speak French.
I don\'t want to drink any more beer right now.
Tom\'s car is parked in front of Mary\'s house.
I think I have to begin working on my homework.
I think Tom, without question, is going to win.
Why don\'t you try it again from the beginning?
Tom said he didn\'t want any of us to help him.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary\'s phone number was.
